name: bootstrap-pagelet
description: Base Pagelet that is responsible for bootstrapping the client side of BigPipe

scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=test istanbul cover ./node_modules/.bin/_mocha $(find test -name '*.test.js') --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js || true && rm -rf ./coverage

author: Martijn Swaagman
